quote: I went to a bookstore and asked the saleswoman, 'Where's the self-help section?' She said if she told me, it would defeat the purpose.
author: George Carlin

quote: When you desire to help, you will find a way to do it.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Self-Help I asked the bookseller,'Do you have any self-help books for addiction?'He said,'If I tell you, I'd be enabling you.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: As an author, I like self-help, because clapping can be done by myself, for myself. I should buy gloves.
author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE

quote: It is one of the beautiful compensations of life that no man can sincerely try to help another without helping himself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Seek opportunities to help and you will be a success
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If the self-help books worked, it would be a shrinking industry not a growing one.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Remember, if you ever need a helping hand, it's at the end of your arm, as you get older, remember you have another hand: The first is to help yourself, the second is to help others.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Give your weakness to one who helps.
author: Rumi

quote: Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others. Unsuccessful people are always asking, "What's in it for me?
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Sometimes, the best way to help someone is just to be near them.
author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent

quote: Everybody talks about wanting to change things and help and fix, but ultimately all you can do is fix yourself. And that's a lot. Because if you can fix yourself, it has a ripple effect.
author: Rob Reiner

quote: Self education is the key to self liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Helping others is the secret sauce to a happy life.
author: Todd Stocker,  Refined: Turning Pain Into Purpose

quote: Helping others in need is not only a responsibility of life; it is what gives meaning to life.
author: Mollie Marti

quote: Self-Motivation [10w] "Today I'll do something more extraordinarythan I did yesterday.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Life is Like a Program, You need to rectify your problems on your Own
author: Pratik Shelar

quote: Compassion and Self-Neglect [10w] Compassionate people know how to care of everybody but themselves.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: Lose your self to find yourself.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: A strong, positive self-image is the best possible preparation for success.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: Teach a child not to seek help but to seek the opportunity to help others.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: In life, you can blame a lot of people and you can wallow in self-pity, or you can pick yourself up and say, 'Listen, I have to be responsible for myself.'
author: Howard Schultz

quote: The 2-Step Self-Discovery Program The first step in self-discovery is not giving a shit what anybody else thinks.The second step is knowing you're a self-centered asshole.
author: Beryl Dov

quote: God loves to help him who strives to help himself.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Love is the outreach of self toward completion.
author: Ralph W. Sockman

quote: People who love themselves, don’t hurt other people. The more we hate ourselves, the more we want others to suffer.
author: Dan Pearce,  Single Dad Laughing

quote: I always pass on good advice. It is the only thing to do with it. It is never of any use to oneself.
author: Oscar Wilde,  An Ideal Husband

quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: The goal is to learn to be nurturing with yourself so you can feel free.
author: Deborah Day

quote: Anybody who succeeds is helping people. The secret to success is find a need and fill it; find a hurt and heal it; find a problem and solve it.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Missing someone, they say, is self-centered.I self-center you more than ever.
author: Saša Stanišić,  How the Soldier Repairs the Gramophone

quote: Feed your self-esteem; not your ego!
author: Deborah Brodie

quote: Google, Facebook helps people than people helps people, in today's world
author: Jeevagan Nagarajan

quote: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: When you're struggling with something, look at all the people around you and realize that every single person you see is struggling with something, and to them, it's just as hard as what you're going through.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John

quote: Self-discipline is a form of freedom. Freedom from laziness and lethargy, freedom from expectations and demands of others, freedom from weakness and fear -- and doubt.
author: H.A. Dorfman

quote: If you don't love yourself, you won't be happy with yourself. If you can't love yourself, you can't love anyone else. You can't give the love you do not have. You can't make anyone love you without loving yourself first.
author: Kemi Sogunle

quote: Self-education is the greatest self-liberation.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Only you can take inner freedom away from yourself, or give it to yourself. Nobody else can.
author: Michael A. Singer,  The Untethered Soul: The Journey Beyond Yourself

quote: Then I realised that I was the god on this occasion. I had tried to help the bluebottle, but it wouldn't let me. And then I felt sorry for God because I understood his frustration. Sometimes when people offer a helping hand, it gets pushed away. People always want to help themselves first.
author: Cecelia Ahern,  The Book of Tomorrow

quote: When you depersonalize abrasive behavior and see it as a call for help you become a catalyst for the best kind of change.
author: Marilyn Suttle

quote: Despair is the price one pays for self-awareness. Look deeply into life, and you'll always find despair.
author: Irvin D. Yalom,  When Nietzsche Wept

quote: I restore myself when I'm alone.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. Your really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: It is not so much our friends' help that helps us, as the confidence of their help.
author: Epicurus

quote: Don’t hope you will receive help from the words of life because they all bring you to death.
author: Sorin Cerin,  Wisdom Collection: The Book of Wisdom

quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can't help them, at least don't hurt them.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: I remainMistress of mine own self and mine own soul
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: I've been surrounded by a lot of people who felt that external success would result in them feeling good about themselves. But it just seems extremely unfulfilling to me.
author: Alanis Morissette
